document.full_text: at least four people died in protests across the arab world demanding political change and better living standards on friday, the muslim day of prayer and a rallying point for the wave of unrest in the region this year.
document.title: at least four die in protests across arab world
lines_and_colors: at least four people died in protests across the arab world demanding political change and better living standards on friday, the muslim day of prayer and a rallying point for the wave of unrest in the region this year.
